Topic.Title: Loading more than one line into a textbox

Posts.EditableText:
I am creating a homework organiser in VB, as well as a reader.  A want to get it so that all lines are loaded back into the textbox when the reader is opened, but using what I know simply won't work.

I recently downloaded an ASL Editor, which loaded every single line of text of my game into it's textbox.  I think it was by Computer Whiz.

Anyway, if anyone knows how do this, could they please respond here

Matthew G.
